out_file.description: Flask application for a todo list with priority tagging. Contains routes for index, adding tasks with priority, and deleting tasks.
HTML template for the todo list interface, including form for adding tasks with priority selection and displaying tasks with priority indicators.
CSS stylesheet that provides a centered layout, card-style design, and clear visual feedback for buttons and task items.
List of Python dependencies required to run the application, including the Flask framework.
CSS styles for the todo app, including container, buttons, and priority color classes.
